summary: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.
cast: Sofia Black-D'Elia|Analeigh Tipton|Travis Tope|Michael Kelly|Machine Gun Kelly|John Cothran|Stoney Westmoreland|Linzie Gray|Judyann Elder|Philip Labes|Brianne Howey|Alexa Fischer|Brendon Eggertsen|Jennifer Say Gan|Matt Knudsen|Dean Neistat|Paul Trunz|Annie Ellis|Paul Lacovara|Jay Hieron|Britt Kyle|Lucy Morningstar|Isabelle Sitterle|William Patrick Brown|James Clayton|Frisco Cosme|Rick Craft|Alizabeth Hamer|Michael Rader|Anna Ross|Shawn Turner|Stacy Marie Turner
keywords: blood splatter|bubble gum|cannibalism|centers for disease control|contagion
title: Viral
